abstract: XIO Group, a private equity firm, has agreed to buy J.D. Power and Associates, best known for providing consumer surveys in more than a dozen industries.
snippet: XIO Group, a private equity firm, has agreed to buy J.D. Power and Associates, best known for providing consumer surveys in more than a dozen industries.
lead_paragraph: XIO Group, a private equity firm co-founded in 2014 by the former head of BlackRock Alternative Investors for Asia Pacific, said on Friday that it had agreed to acquire J. D. Power and Associates for $1.1 billion from McGraw Hill Financial, in what will be its biggest investment yet and its first in the United States.

headline.main: McGraw Hill to Sell J.D. Power for $1.1 Billion
headline.print_headline: J. D. Power to Be Sold
